details.translations: "My Lord, indeed my people have denied me.

details.arabic_diacless: فافتح بينى وبينهم فتحا ونجنى ومن معى من المؤمنين‏
details.arabic: فَافۡتَحۡ بَيۡنِىۡ وَبَيۡنَهُمۡ فَتۡحًا وَّنَجِّنِىۡ وَمَنۡ مَّعِىَ مِنَ الۡمُؤۡمِنِيۡنَ‏
details.transliteration: Faftah baynee wabaynahum fathanwanajjinee waman maAAiya mina almu/mineen
details.translations: Then judge between me and them with decisive judgement and save me and those with me of the believers."
